embeds.title: Help
embeds.description: Here are the commands you can use with this bot.

connect.returns: This will require you to login with Steam, the only information collected from this is your Steam64ID, anything else will not be used. Click the button below to proceed. After this process, you will never need to do this again, this account will carry over to every server
connect.error: An error occurred while trying to connect your Steam account, please try again.

disconnect.returns: You have successfully disconnected your Steam account from the bot, if you wish to reconnect, use the /connect command

config.invalid_value: Invalid value for this option, please try again.
config.no_access_send: I do not have permission to send messages in that channel.
config.no_access_create: I do not have permission to create channels in that category.

standard.title: Configuration
standard.description: Here are the current configuration settings for this server. Use the text inside the brackets when choosing the option to change using this command

config_option_names.mod_role: Role that gets added to all tickets (mod_role)
config_option_names.message: Message to send to the ticket when it is created, if the person is in the discord (message)
config_option_names.locale: Language to use for the bot, per server (locale)

config.success: Successfully updated the configuration for this server.

config_option_names.locale: Language to use when interacting with you (locale)

settings.invalid_value: Invalid value for this option, please try again.

standard.title: Settings
standard.description: Here are the current settings for you. Use the text inside the brackets when choosing the option to change using this command

setup.already_setup: This server has already been setup.

embeds.title: Setup
embeds.description:
Here is the token you will need to access the bot via our API. This is a one-time token, so make sure to save it somewhere safe, if you lose it, you will have to request support via our discord.
`{token}`

Use the /config command to edit options within the bot. Please add the above token into the config file for the Friday plugin here: https://github.com/JayXTQ/FridayPlugin/releases/latest

ticket.default_message: Hello, thank you for reporting this user. A member of staff will be with you shortly.
ticket.default_message_no_user: This ticket was created via the in game report system, no user was found, relevant information is below.

close.invalid_channel: This is not a ticket channel.
close.closed: Ticket has been closed by {user}, please run /delete to remove this channel.
close.already_closed: This ticket has already been closed.

embeds.description_user: Ticket {id} made by {created} has been closed by {user} for {reason}.

close.user_closed: Your ticket has been closed for {reason}. Here is the transcript:
close.no_permissions_edit: I couldn't make it so the ticket users can't see the channel, check that I have the "Manage Channel" and "Manage Permissions" permission for this channel.
close.no_permissions_name: I couldn't change the name of this channel to closed due to my permissions, check that I have the "Manage Channel" and "Manage Permissions" permission for this channel.

delete.invalid_channel: Either this is not a ticket channel or this channel is not marked as closed.

embeds.title: Ticket Deleted

delete.no_permissions: I couldn't delete this channel, check that I have the "Manage Channel" permission for this channel.
